Flow.description: Updated #JIRA: SSC-1220: Added Pending Activation Status for Marketing Package TLB

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Additional_Charges__c].Status__c , 'Terminated')), OR([Additional_Charges__c].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'HU_Additional_Charges', [Additional_Charges__c].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'PY_Additional_Charges', [Additional_Charges__c].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Talabat_Additional_Charges'), OR( AND(ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL([Additional_Charges__c].Status__c, 'Active') ), AND(ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL([Additional_Charges__c].Status__c, 'Pending Activation') ), OR( AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL([Additional_Charges__c].Status__c , 'Active'), ISCHANGED([Additional_Charges__c].Status__c) ), ISCHANGED([Additional_Charges__c].Termination_Date__c) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status__c} , 'Terminated')), OR({!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} == 'HU_Additional_Charges', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} == 'PY_Additional_Charges', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} == 'Talabat_Additional_Charges'), OR( AND(ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status__c}, 'Active') ), AND(ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status__c}, 'Pending Activation') ), OR( AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status__c} , 'Active'), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status__c}) ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Termination_Date__c}) ) ) )

Flow.label: AddChargesToBackendIntegeration
